dmca.title: Under Watercolours wants to sink claimed copier
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam,

The copyrighted work at issue are the photos that appears on: http://www.cyber-diver.com
http://www.cdnn.info
http://www.scubalinx.com
These web sites are inter-linked and are all run by the same person. Both he (via the forms on his web site) and his web hosting company have been notified of these infringements.

Infringing Web Pages:
Web Search Query: Bonnie Pelnar scubalinx web_bonnie_pelnar jpg
Image Search Query: Cyber diver cuan law http://www.cyber-diver.com/assets/images/cuan_law_300200.jpg http://www.scubalinx.com/web_cuan_law.jpg
http://www.cyber-diver.com/assetsli mages/cuan_law_300150.jpg http:l/www.scubalinx.camldive centerlcahbbean/cuan_12072 e.gif

diver.com/assetslimagesfcuanlaw_120180.g if

Image Search Query: scubalinx cuan law http:l/www.scubalinx.comlweb_cuanjaw.jpg

http:/Avww.scubalinx.com/boatlliveaboardskuan_12072.gif http:f/www.scubalinx.com/dive_centericaribbeanlcuan_12072 egif
Image Search Query: scubalinx lammer law http://www.scubalinx.comfassetslimagesldb images/web_la mmerlaw.jpg
http:lfwww.scubalinx.comlboatfliveaboards/cuan_12072.gif

euanlaw_120150.gif	http://www.artificialreefs.org/Articles/CDNN%20Scub a%20News%20 

My Contact Information: [private]@underwatercolours.com

Infringer's Contact Information: John Doe - The company calls themselves LIES Global Publishing, but has no accurate contact info on their websites. Domain names are registered to an address of an island in New Zealand, but advertisers send payments to a PO Box in Seattle. We are currently working on obtaining a court ordered subpoena to his hosting company to reveal his identity.
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,
 
 
 
Sincerely,
[signature]
 
[private], Owner
Under Watercolours
Phone: [private]
Email: [private]@underwatercolours.com
